TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PolicyItem extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A policy item containing the custom settings for a single policy feature included in the information policy.

remarks.para: Logically, each policy is a collection of instruction sets for one or more policy features. For each policy feature that you want to include in a policy, you include an instruction set, called a policy item, in the policy. A policy item contains the settings for only one policy feature.
For more information about information policies and policy features, see Introduction to Information Management Policy.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BlockPreview { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
public: property System::String ^ CustomData { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets any custom information the policy feature requires for operation.
Docs.value: A string that represents any custom information the policy feature requires for operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Description As String
public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the concise description of the policy item.
Docs.value: A string that represents the concise description of the policy item.

remarks.para: Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 displays this description in the Central Administration interface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Id As String
public: property System::String ^ Id { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the ID of the policy feature that this policy item configures.
Docs.value: A string that represents the ID of the policy feature that this policy item configures.

remarks.para: While Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 does not require it, we recommend the use of fully qualified names for policy features.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the policy item name that is displayed in the Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 interface.
Docs.value: A string that represents the policy item name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Statement As String
public: property System::String ^ Statement { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the long description of the policy item.
Docs.value: A string that represents the long description of the policy item.

remarks.para: This description is displayed to end users in the Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Update() cil managed

Docs.summary: Writes the changes made to the policy item back to the SharePoint content database.

remarks.para: If you do not call this method, any changes you have made programmatically to the policy item are not saved.
